help-file.title: "SOULSHIELD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: o Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
"Soulshield" creates an aligned area of power around the caster which provides protection against dispel good/evil and (un)holy word spells. "Soulshield" also protects the caster from a small amount of physical damage from opposite aligned creatures.
